name: Energy Force
description:
Energy Force is a puzzle-platformer game where you are trying to pass every level by collecting all the power cells, powerups or destroy the enemies where needed! You are a ball that bounces infinitely, trying to collect all the power cells to charge yourself so that you can be free.

___
Operating Systems:
Windows 32 / 64
Linux 32 / 64
Mac 64

___

If you want to get in touch, report bugs, or know more about the game, you can find me @SteliosWinters

If you want to find out more about my other projects, check out - SteliosWinters.com

Music by Technoaxe

Thank you for visiting, and for those who enjoyed this page enough to buy it, I appreciate the support and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating and testing it!
